page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE-GARDEN & LEISURE
page.content: There are 3 swimming pools,2 tennis courts. Gardens have flowers,lawn and vegetables. Most use motor mowers, some have power cultivators,saws and hedge cutters-some paid help. Pets include cats,dogs,horses,rabbits,birds and fish (ornamental and tropical). Leisure activities include badminton, shooting,fishing,hunting,jogging, riding,cycling,hiking,croquet,snooker and billiards,yoga,skittles,Scottish dancing,gardening,birdwatching,various board games,reading,collecting,wine tasting,archaeology,flower arranging, music making,pottery,bee keeping, needlework,embroidery,knitting,jigsaws ,photography,woodwork,painting,natural history,home maintainance ,family holidays (home and abroad, camping and caravanning),shopping in Alresford Winchester and Southampton. Outings to pub,theatre,restaurant,sporting event.
